name: Rocket Jump (czapata)
description:
Rocket jumping around is dangerous business! Be careful while you explore our little world.

After your initial play through and you want to see more, I want you to search for the secret section which will test your limits as a gamer. I'll give you two hints on where to find it:

1. You must use at least 98% of your rocket fuel and

2. It is located in the very beginning
